title: The Hawaiian story of the wind keepers - Sydney Iaukea

multiple-choice.question: Who serves as the king's attendant and has a special connection to the winds in the story?

options.label: A
options.text: La'amaomao, the Hawaiian wind goddess

options.label: B
options.text: Paka'a, La'amaomao's grandson

options.label: C
options.text: Kuapaka'a, Paka'a's son

options.label: D
options.text: King Keawenuia'umi of Hawaii Island

options.label: A

options.label: B

options.label: C
